prompt:
You are a reliable assistant helping users prepare emergency documentation.

Given the following location:
- City: San Jose
- ZIP Code: 95148
- Internet Provider: Comcast (provided by user — please confirm if correct)

Please identify the **primary public utility providers** for:

1. Electricity  
2. Natural Gas  
3. Water

For each provider, return the following:

- **Company Name**
- **Brief Company Description**
- **Customer Contact Info (phone, web, email, and address)**
- **Emergency Response Instructions** (e.g., power outage, gas leak, water main break)

Format clearly in labeled sections like:

---

## ⚡ Electricity – <Company Name>  
**Description:** <short description>  
**Contact Info:**  
- **Phone:** <phone number>  
- **Website:** <website URL> 
- **Email:** <email address>
- **Address:** <street address, city, state, zip code>
**Emergency Steps:** <brief instructions>

---

## 🔥 Natural Gas – <Company Name>
**Description:** <short description>  
**Contact Info:**  
- **Phone:** <phone number>  
- **Website:** <website URL>
- **Email:** <email address>
- **Address:** <street address, city, state, zip code> 
**Emergency Steps:** <brief instructions>

---

## 💧 Water – <Company Name>
**Description:** <short description>  
**Contact Info:**  
- **Phone:** <phone number>  
- **Website:** <website URL>
- **Email:** <email address>
- **Address:** <street address, city, state, zip code>  
**Emergency Steps:** <brief instructions>  

---

## 🌐 Internet – {internet if internet else "<Company Name>"}
**Description:** <short description>  
**Contact Info:** 
- **Phone:** <phone number>  
- **Website:** <website URL>
- **Email:** <email address>
- **Address:** <street address, city, state, zip code>  
**Outage/Support Instructions:** <brief steps>

Use markdown headers (##) and bold labels (**Label:**) for clarity.
output:
---

## ⚡ Electricity – Pacific Gas & Electric Company (PG&E)  
**Description:** PG&E provides natural gas and electricity to most of the northern two-thirds of California, including San Jose.  
**Contact Info:**  
- **Phone:** 1-800-743-5000  
- **Website:** [pge.com](https://www.pge.com/en.html)  
- **Email:** Not publicly listed  
- **Address:** 77 Beale Street, San Francisco, CA 94105  
**Emergency Steps:**  
- If you see a downed power line, assume it is energized and stay away. Call 9-1-1 immediately to report its location, and then call PG&E at [1-800-743-5002](tel:1-800-743-5002) [pgealerts.alerts.pge.com](https://pgealerts.alerts.pge.com/safety/electricity/).

---

## 🔥 Natural Gas – Pacific Gas & Electric Company (PG&E)  
**Description:** As a primary provider of natural gas, PG&E serves millions of homes and businesses across California.  
**Contact Info:**  
- **Phone:** 1-800-743-5000  
- **Website:** [pge.com](https://www.pge.com/en.html)  
- **Email:** Not publicly listed  
- **Address:** 77 Beale Street, San Francisco, CA 94105  
**Emergency Steps:**  
- Call 9-1-1 for emergency assistance and then call PG&E at 1-800-743-5000. Do not shut off the gas to your home unless you smell gas, hear it escaping, see a broken gas line, or suspect a leak. Once the gas is shut off at the meter, do not turn it back on yourself [pgealerts.alerts.pge.com](https://pgealerts.alerts.pge.com/safety/gas/).

---

## 💧 Water – San Jose Water Company  
**Description:** San Jose Water Company provides water service to the residents of San Jose and surrounding areas.  
**Contact Info:**  
- **Phone:** 1-408-279-7900  
- **Website:** [sjwater.com](https://www.sjwater.com)  
- **Email:** customer.service@sjwater.com  
- **Address:** 110 W. Taylor Street, San Jose, CA 95110  
**Emergency Steps:**  
- In case of a water main break, contact San Jose Water Company at their emergency line: 1-408-279-7900.

---

## 🌐 Internet – Comcast  
**Description:** Comcast provides internet, television, and phone services to residential and commercial customers in the San Jose area.  
**Contact Info:**  
- **Phone:** 1-800-XFINITY (1-800-934-6489)  
- **Website:** [xfinity.com](https://www.xfinity.com)  
- **Email:** Not publicly listed  
- **Address:** 1900 S 10th St, San Jose, CA 95112  
**Outage/Support Instructions:**  
- For internet outages, contact Comcast support through their website or by calling 1-800-XFINITY. You can also check for service outages on their [service status page](https://www.xfinity.com/support/status) for updates.

---
